cohort: Any characteristics of the population(s) studied, plus whether the result was taken from a subgroup of the cohort tested.
publication_date: print publication date or posted date if not in print (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY)
publication_reference_url: Patel et al. (2018) Impact of Zostavax Vaccination on T-Cell Accumulation and Cutaneous Gene Expression in the Skin of Older Humans After Varicella Zoster Virus Antigen-Specific Challenge. J Infect Dis. PMID: 30247603
signature_source: signature source figure, table or text section
proterm_and_extra: cell type PRO and extra terms
subm_obs_id: ID of observation within its own submission
uniq_obs_id: Uniq ID of observation within its submission type
